name: Locks and Lillies
description:
A persistent lily flower wants to escape the greenhouse. If only they weren't locked in...

By  Scoot-o-Speed-Studios (@scoot_o)

Controls

- WASD to Move
- Space to Interact and Advance Dialogue
- K to skip the minigame if needed :)
- Hold ESC (escape) to skip dialog if you want to try for another ending :) 
       Only works in windowed view

Wasp swatting minigame

- WASD for left hand
- Arrow Keys for right hand
- Squish the wasps between them!
- To skip through the minigame press K
